title: Looking for people for casual ranked team S5- G1
body: Hey, I decided to make a casual ranked team. Nothing super competitive, just for fun to get away from the cancer that solo ranked can be. Preferably if on daily, but weekend warriors are welcome as well (Weekends is probably when most of ranked game-play will take place anyways). I am a Gold 2 Support main. But I can fill other roles depending on what our team needs. Add in game IGN: Loony Russian. Preferred time zone: Pacific
